item.title: CPH Tool Documentation
item.description: Summary Competitive Programming Helper (CPH) is a command line tool that automates many tasks for the Competitive Programmer. It’s written in Bash shell scripting. Installation Installation on linux system Step 1: Install dependence If the dependence does not install in your system then you must install it. The dependence are bash, curl and g++ Debian/Ubuntu: sudo apt update sudo apt install bash curl g++ Fadora/Centos: sudo dnf check-update sudo dnf install bash curl g++ Step 2: Install the cph tools curl -fLo cph https://raw.
